main.title: Panda Print
main.subtitle: The fastest, easiest way to print your favorite photos. Just text us your pictures and we'll handle everything else.

section-1.title: Print photos with just a text message
section-1.text: No downloading apps. No driving to the store. Just text messages to get high quality photos.

section-2.title: High quality photos at a low price

blobs.title: Text Message Ordering
blobs.text: Order your photos the same way you chat with your friends. No complicated apps or trips to Wallgreens.

blobs.title: Highest Quality Prints
blobs.text: We use the most advanced wet-lab equipment in the world with silver halide photo prints on Fujifilm paper to deliver the best print quality possible

blobs.title: Lowest Prices Guarenteed
blobs.text: We partner with the most efficient labs around the world so you save money on printing and shipping

blobs.title: Jenna R.
blobs.subtitle: "I couldn't believe how simple it was to print my photos. I wish everything was as easy as Panda Print!"

blobs.title: Katie M.
blobs.subtitle: "My room looks so good with all these new pictures! Thank you Panda Print!!"

blobs.title: Eric B.
blobs.subtitle: "Panda Print saved Christmas for me! My wife loves the pictures they printed, and it couldn't have been easier."

blobs.title: Nancy A.
blobs.subtitle: "I don't use computers much, but even I figured out Panda Print in no time. Now I can put pictures of my grandkids on the refridgerator!"

blobs.title: Stacy M.
blobs.subtitle: I started using Panda Print just after we had our second baby last year, and now I'm printing photos almost every day. I love it!

blobs.title: Andrew H.
blobs.subtitle: I don't know why anyone would use anything other than Panda Print. The quality is amazing, the price is great, and it's incredibly easy.

section-5.title: Sign up for free
section-5.subtitle: Once you've set up a profile, we'll be able to print the photos you send us.

contacts.text: Avocet Sales & Marketing, Inc., 737 2nd Street, Suite 305, Oakland, California 94607

section-4.title: Easy pricing for easy pictures
section-4.subtitle: Our photo packs cost just $7.99 for up to 10 photos. To save you money, we'll wait until you have 10 photos in your order before printing and shipping. You can always ship earlier by sending us a message.
